programme.title: Hua Hee Everyday
programme.desc: Malaysias highest-rated Hokkien sitcom, Hua Hee Everyday is back with a hilarious new season, plus the introduction of new characters. Kim Shuis son, Ah Huat falls in love with Xiao Yu, an ice-kacang seller who poses a threat to his grandmas kuih stall. But he is encouraged by his father to follow his heart. Despite a successful career, Bee Hong again puts her marriage at risk by succumbing to temptation. Spurred on by their online business with Ban Ji Beng, Pearl and Rou Wan contemplate taking their relationship to another level. And just when Pek Hun finally sees some light at the end of the tunnel in her struggle to conceive, new issues arise to throw everything into disarray. Join Kim Shui, his family and his friends in overcoming adversities through optimism and determination!

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Arpo is on baby duty, but this is no ordinary baby! From super-strength to unexpected transformations, Arpo has his hands full keeping the baby safe.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: School is in session with JJ! Learn about numbers, shapes, and colors in this fun and musical journey through the classroom.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Ready, set, play! Its sports day, and JJ is learning how to swim, play soccer, and have fun being active with his friends.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Its time to play! Meekah and her friends are at an indoor playground, where they make up fun games and learn how to play together.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Where is Blippi today? Join Blippi as he visits the Funtastic Playtorium at Tacoma Mall, WA. Blippi explores the indoor play place for kids while learning core education for children such as Colors, Numbers and more! Blippi visits an indoor playhouse. Come along with Blippi as he climbs, jumps and slides his way into learning the importance of exercise.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Join Blippi and Meekah for a healthy and active day! The fun begins as they create a story about a forest journey and use their bodies to act it out in a fun exercise game. Afterwards they continue their healthy routine by stretching and heading to the kitchen to make delicious breakfast smoothies and healthy snacks with their friend Shawn Johnson!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: When Gecko needs a hand, his fantastic friends are always there to help him, showing the true power of teamwork and friendship.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Follow Baby Bus on her first day of adventures! Shes learning the ropes at Geckos Garage and discovering what makes her special.

programme.title: Air Asia Buds Adventures
programme.desc: Its time for a high-flying adventure with the Air Asia Buds! Join them as they explore a busy fire station, visit a fun-filled farm, and learn all about amazing animals. Their journey takes them to incredible destinations around the world, from the vibrant streets of Bangkok and the beautiful beaches of the Philippines to the bustling city of Kuala Lumpur. Its a non-stop trip full of fun, learning, and discovery.

programme.title: VeeFriends
programme.desc: The VeeFriends are ready for some friendly competition! The action starts with an exciting egg and spoon race that tests everyones balance and speed. The challenges continue with an intense staring contest, a hilarious water balloon fight, and a strategic game of hide-and-seek. programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura dan Fariz bahagia dan mereka berbulan madu. Tanpa mereka sedari, ibu bapa Ainnura dan Fariz sama risau dan mula curiga dengan kehilangan dan perubahan sikap mereka. Apa yang akan terjadi?

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura berduka hati kerana tidak dapat bertemu Fariz. Kerana itu, Ainurra nekad melarikan diri menyelamatkan diri tanpa mengetahui ujian terbesar yang harus dihadapi adalah keluarga Fariz. Keluarga Encik Adnan dan Encik Fadzlan menyerang Tokwan. Bagaimana dengan Ainurra dan Fariz?

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Dr. Aish dimarahi oleh penyelianya kerana didapati tidak focus dalam melaksanakan tugasan hospital. Ada pertengkaran berlaku antara Dr. Erin dan Dr. Aish. Oya didapat cuba lari dari pusat latihan.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Oya rindukan keluarganya dan menyatakan perasan tidak puas hati untuk berasda di pusat latihan tersebut. Oya dan Mika masih terus bertengkar. Harun cuba untuk memenangi hati Jenab.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Encik Fadzlan mengugut Fariz untuk menceraikan Ain. Hingga akhirnya Fariz terpaksa juga menceraikan Ain. Fariz kecewa dengan sikap ayah dan ibunya. Setelah bercerai,Ain mula berubah sikap dan kemurungan. Apakah Fariz akan kembali rujuk pada Ain?

programme.title: Made in Germany
programme.desc: Made in Germany gives an inside view into the global economy with gripping business reports from the heart of Europe. Our reporters are where the economic action is.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News, information and analysis of German and European topics.

programme.title: Cik Puan Sinderella
programme.desc: This is a lighthearted family drama about a teenage girl who is closely guarded by her mother.

programme.title: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan Anak Kerak demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Buta
programme.desc: Telefilem komedi romantik tentang perkenalan singkat di antara Zulin, seorang gadis yang tidak pernah bercinta, dengan Izlan, seorang duda dalam satu blind date yang diaturkan oleh Nadya Ramanshah.

programme.title: Matahari
programme.desc: Fauzi seorang guru yang telah dihantar untuk berkhidmat di Sabah. Di sana dia telah berkenalan dengan seorang novelis yang sedang mengalami masalah writers block iaitu Yazid.

programme.title: Meniti Cinta Di Starimost
programme.desc: Iman dipaksa berkahwin dengan Qaseh, anak kepada orang gajinya untuk mewarisi harta bapanya. Percutian mereka di Bosnia membuahkan bibit-bibit cinta. Lakonan Iqram Dinzly, Zarina Zainoordin dan Yana Shamsudin.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani And Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.

programme.title: Kampung Kuala Lambat
programme.desc: Kampung Kuala Lambat bagai mengalami sumpahan apabila lelaki yang berkahwin muda akan mati di hari pernikahan mereka namun kejadian ganjil ini tidak berlaku kepada lelaki yang berusia 60 tahun ke atas.

programme.title: Musnahkan Pelamin Anganku
programme.desc: Mikael yang merupakan seorang wedding planner menerima tawaran besar untuk menjayakan sebuah majlis perkahwinan pelanggannya. Namun majlis perkahwinan tersebut merupakan majlis bekas isterinya.

programme.title: Dua
programme.desc: Kisah Farhan yang kehilangan kembarnya Fahrin dalam satu kemalangan tragis. Dia kemudiannya mengambil-alih kehidupan Fahrin namun terperangkap dalam sebuah cinta tiga segi pula. Lakonan Eusoff Hashim dan Sharifah Sakinah.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: Cupid
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang ejen yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat penghancur jodoh yang ditugaskan untuk memikat seorang wanita supaya dapat melupakan suaminya yang telah diisytiharkan meninggal dunia. Namun dia jatuh cinta pada wanita tersebut

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Tolong Saya Encik Dinosaur
programme.desc: Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

programme.title: Cubit - Cubit Cinta
programme.desc: Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, its a platform for healing people with unrequited love.

programme.title: Duit Kawin
programme.desc: Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.

programme.title: Biarkan Cinta Tersenyum Lagi
programme.desc: Kisah penulis lagu Maya Arisa yang menghidap tumor otak dan mengimpikan untuk berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang jurugambar bernama Redza.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Racun Suami Jahanam
programme.desc: Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.

programme.title: 6 Hari
programme.desc: Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.

programme.title: Arts24
programme.desc: How do artists and writers see the world? We take you to the crossroads where culture meets the news and engages with whats happening in our lives today.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: An international news bulletin, presented live from the newsroom.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: A single mother must protect her daughter and herself during a heist gone wrong at a high-tech storage facility.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: Mojave Diamonds
programme.desc: A former MMA fighter and his brothers must rescue their kidnapped family from a dangerous crime syndicate after $50M of illegal diamonds gets stolen.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her friends and family and with her career in jeopardy, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord who just may be more dangerous than she is.

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Chosen Family
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Enter The Clones of Bruce
programme.desc: Enter the Clones of Bruce dives into the Bruce Lee exploitation craze, otherwise known as Bruceploitation.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Operation Sea Wolf
programme.desc: The German Navy and the last remaining U-Boats, were formed together for one last mission to attack the United States Homeland.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommys demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Guns
programme.desc: A deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

programme.title: Pocket Listing
programme.desc: Double crosses, adultery, murder, mistaken identity, and revenge ensue when a mysterious power player and his sultry wife hire a disgraced Los Angeles property broker to discreetly market and sell their Malibu villa.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: Tormented by his criminal past, Clean attempts a quiet life caring for his community and as a mentor to his young neighbor Dianda. When local gang violence puts his neighbors life in danger, Clean finds himself returning to his violent past.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: Blindfire
programme.desc: A police officer who while responding to a violent hostage call, kills the African American suspect only to later learn of his innocence. Sensing this was a set-up, and facing repercussions, he must track down the person responsible while examining his own accountability and the ingrained racism which brought him to this point.

programme.title: THE BLACK KNIGHT RETURNS
programme.desc: As an evil force rises to threaten the city, a young man returns home to take over The Black Knight legacy.

programme.title: DAY 3
programme.desc: Shaken by Claudias revelation, J.T. attempts to run a secret ballistics test on the gun she carries in her purse but succeeds only in tearing up his basement workshop. Meanwhile, the results of the other tests are coming in. Tim Sanders says the crime scene photos and clippings are authentic, even if they are technically impossible. Brad reports the briefcase is, without a doubt, from the future, made of a super-strong, ultra-light material that will make them both rich beyond their dreams if only J.T. will let him keep it. Carl has emerged from a frantic all-nighter with an unsettling conclusion. Not only does physics indicate that J.T. will die on Friday, but Carl has predicted the universe will be irrevocably damaged if he doesnt.

programme.title: DAY 4
programme.desc: As the day of his predicted death approaches, a deeply depressed J.T. seems resigned to his fate. He creates a video will, leaving everything to Jesse, and tries to record some words of wisdom to help his daughter when hes gone. Meanwhile, Jesse manages to get into the briefcase and becomes distraught over the case file inside. But Jesse isnt ready to give up, and after J.T. explains the situation, she convinces him he must keep fighting back.

programme.title: DAY 5
programme.desc: Despite J.T.s efforts to change his fate and the cooperation of Sikorski, the clock ticks inexorably towards J.T.s demise. Carl, convinced that J.Ts survival will imperil the universe, is frantically working to make sure that he meets his destiny. Brad has armed himself with a hunting rifle, determined to retrieve the briefcase he believes will make him rich. When J.T. returns to his home with Sikorski, they find that the two cops assigned to guard the house have been knocked out and someone has taken Claudia and Jesse hostage. They soon learn that Roy Bremmers lawyer had his client released from custody hours earlier.

programme.title: Saka Sisters
programme.desc: Recently, Laila and Suri lost their father. They were shocked with the presence of a saka, Jamal. Jamal follows them wherever they go. As long as they live, Jamal belongs to them.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs lives.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its always cool to be cool on Lellobee City Farm! A penguin visits and teaches everyone how to stay cool on a hot day. The ducklings have their first flying lesson and the friends clean out the pond to give the animals a nice new home. Plus, celebrate the Moon Festival with a special party.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day for an animal adventure! Join JJ as he visits a farm to sing Old MacDonald with all the animals. programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Lets learn about teeth and food! Join JJ to discover his favorite pizza toppings and then take a trip to a farm to count apples. After all that yummy food, learn how to take care of your teeth by brushing them well. When JJ gets nervous about a dentist visit, his siblings show him it can be fun. Plus, learn how to make a healthy and delicious frozen fruit treat!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Theres always a reason to sing with Little Angel! Baby Johns imagination runs wild as he plays pretend, becoming a doctor and a chef all in one day. Later, he learns to be brave and overcome his fear of the dark with a happy song. The adventure continues with a fun-filled family day at the swimming pool, proving that every activity is better with a little music.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: The sun is shining, and its a perfect day for the playground! Join Baby John as he explores the swings, the slide, and the sandbox. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about how to take turns with his friends and why sharing his toys makes every game more fun for everyone. Its a story about the joy of playing together.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The world is so much fun to explore! Join Blippi on his adventures as he discovers how rainbows get their colors and what its like on the moon while learning about gravity. Hell dive deep into the ocean with a jellyfish, find out how honey is made from a busy bee, see how snowflakes are formed and get a tour of a real chocolate factory. Its an exciting journey full of amazing discoveries!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready for some thrilling adventures with Blippi Wonders! This journey is packed with excitement and learning. Discover how a firetruck and a police car work, learn about the sticky science of glue, and see the amazing power of magnets. Its a fun-filled exploration of the amazing things that make our world work.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Prepare for pandemonium! Arpo and Daniels attempt at gardening takes a dangerous turn when their plant grows into a monstrous creature that tries to eat everyone. As if thats not enough, the new smart house system goes haywire, and the furniture starts a rebellion. Its up to Arpo to fix the pandemonium in this action-packed adventure.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Join ARPO for a day of non-stop chaos! When a simple handprint painting session with Daniel turns into a colorful mess, thats just the beginning. A pesky drone interrupts their peaceful afternoon, leading to an all-out battle for the backyard. See how ARPO handles one unexpected event after another in this wild and wacky tale.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Beep, beep! Its time for a vehicle adventure. Hop aboard the bus with JJ and sing about its wheels, wipers, and horn. The journey continues as he discovers cars of every color and other amazing machines that vroom and zoom. Its a high-energy story celebrating all the things that go.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for giggles and fun! When JJs toy is broken, Boba cheers him up by pretending to be a tickly caterpillar. The friends find a disco mat and have a groovy dance-off. When JJ gets frustrated while skiing, Mochi is there to encourage him. A pirate swipes the bath toys and a buzzing fly interrupts breakfast. Plus, Wally plays firefighter and ends up being the one who needs rescuing!

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to an animal dance party! Join the Animal Song and dance with creatures from the forest, farm and jungle. Find the little duckies who are hiding and play with a hip hippo down by the lake.

programme.title: Morphle

Its a high-flying adventure as they try to dodge two threats and save the citys stolen property.

programme.title: Morphle

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The friends get egged on when they visit the Egg Planet to help a frazzled bunny catch and sort missing eggs. programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for a nursery rhyme fun time! The friends pretend to row their boats in laundry baskets. They do a fun Hop Little Bunnies dance and play Ring-A-Ring O Roses in the garden. They build a bridge with blocks and Mr. Giraffe takes them all for a ride on the bus. Plus, they help two little birds and have a parade with homemade instruments.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Its time to learn about numbers, sounds and colors! The friends fly colorful fish kites at the park and bake some yummy cookies. programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster and Bandit become the giant ice cream thieves when they sneak into a carwash that has been turned into an ice cream machine! They also have to work up the courage to ride the new super-speedyway and help a lost cowboy hat find its way home.

programme.title: Go Buster

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The world is full of wonders, and Blippi is ready to explore them! In this adventure, Blippi Wonders travels to Ancient Egypt to learn about the pyramids, then dives deep into the human brain to see how it works. programme.desc: Join Arpo as he tries to keep the house in order, a task thats easier said than done with Baby Daniel around! This is a story of household adventures and the funny side of chores.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Whats on the menu today? Fun! Join JJ as he learns why its great to eat vegetables with the Yes Yes Vegetables song. Then, get your hands ready for a fun time in the kitchen as he sings and claps along to Pat-a-Cake. Its a delicious and musical tale about our favorite foods.

programme.title: Dance Party

programme.desc: From stopping bullies to fixing broken toys, theres no problem too big or small for Morphle! Bubbles gets stage fright before a big show and has to find her confidence. She also finds a giant bubble and tries to take it home without it popping.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Youre invited to a nursery rhyme dance party! Rock out to a remix of Rockabye Baby with a band of monkeys and dance faster and faster as London Bridge falls down. Fly into outer space to dance among the stars, then dive deep under the sea to swim like a mermaid. Dance about the weather, sing about popping bubbles and play a fun game of freeze dance.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready for some bath time songs! JJ and TomTom have fun making things out of bubbles and staging a heroic rescue with their sea creature toys. When JJ has too much energy at bath time, Mom turns it into a fun game. He also leads a brush your teeth parade, learns about vehicles at the beach and embarks on a high-seas adventure to find a lost sock.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: The school bell is ringing for the very first time for JJ! Join him on the exciting journey of his first day of school. Hell learn how to ride the bus, meet his friendly teacher, and make a whole new group of friends. This story shows that school is a wonderful place for learning, playing, and making new memories.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its time to wind down with JJ. Follow his soothing bedtime routine, from taking a warm bath to brushing his teeth. As he looks out his window at the night sky, he sings Twinkle Twinkle Little Star before snuggling into bed for a sweet lullaby. Its a peaceful and relaxing journey into dreamland.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Get ready for Rock-a-bye-Baby! Jill tries to put Baby John to bed, but he doesnt want to be treated like a baby. The family gets caught in a rainstorm while camping. At the playground, Baby John and Manny get competitive. Baby John gets his first tooth and hes very upset when his lollipop melts. Plus, the family has a fun bake-off competition.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Dive in for a Baby Shark dance party! Jump, clap and chomp with colorful sharks, then hop along with the Easter bunnies. Learn what sound a cow makes, bounce with kangaroos and count five little duckies. Sing about your bestie, see what Cece finds in the sea and finish the party with a graceful princess dance.

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Its time for some sing-along fun! A tiny spider is determined to get a drink from a lemonade stand. JJ goes on a big adventure when he buys some magic beans that grow into a giant beanstalk. The friends play a game of hide-and-seek and JJ spends the day with his bestie, Boba the bear. After a fun day, its time to have a clean-up dance party!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn with JJ! Embark on a musical journey that starts with the ABC Song, making it fun to learn every letter. Once youve mastered the alphabet, the adventure continues with a trip back in time to count from one to ten with a group of silly dinosaurs. Its a fun-filled lesson that makes learning feel like a game.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to build a Snowbod! Pogo wants to show Lulu how fun snow can be, so they build a snowman together, but the sun comes out and starts to melt it! Lulu reads a story about a magical Snowhoof and sets off to find it in real life. On the ice, Fuse gets impatient when Jeff cant learn how to skate as quickly as the others.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for a teddy bear panic! Pogo accidentally ruins Newts special teddy bear-shaped hedge and isnt sure if he should tell the truth. Jeff has to overcome his fear of mud to get his favorite feather duster back. Bubbles wants to take a picture with a big purple star and builds a rocket to get to it. Pogo tries to surprise his friends with ice cream, but it keeps melting.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Get ready for some Baby Bus Mayhem! Baby Truck and Molly learn the importance of sharing their toys. A magic show takes a turn when Yellow Mechanical gets stuck to a giant magnet. At firefighter school, Dandy gets himself into a tricky situation. Weasel causes trouble by cheating in a football match and showing off his faulty gadgets at the fix-up fair, but Gecko and Grandma are there to save the day.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Theres always something exciting happening at Geckos Garage! Today, a cement mixer has made a big mess, and a monster truck has a flat tire. Gecko must use all his tools and skills to help his vehicle friends get back on the road. Its a story about problem-solving and the joy of helping others.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Kemunculan Miss A di internet yang cuba menjatuhkan reputasi Mal membuatkan dia paranoid. Dia cuba siasat semua pelajar dengan nama bermula huruf A, termasuklah Arif dan Adam.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Mal akhirnya tahu siapakah gerangan Miss A yang menyimpan dendam padanya. Mal nak cuba balas apa yang Miss A lakukan padanya dengan bantuan Adam.

programme.title: SMK
programme.desc: Cikgu Mus , guru kaunseling dijemput ke sekolah. Cikgu Mus adalah kawan sekolah Cikgu Aini yang mempunyai sejarahnya tersendiri. Mal terjumpa pita VHS milik Cikgu Mus yang menyimpan rahsia Cikgu Aini.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The era of high housing prices shocks the masses. However, some are willing to live in the mountains for their beloved parrots, just to give them the best breeding environment. Parrots have a long lifespan and their IQ is comparable to that of a five-year-old child. How do you make them behave? Training is actually a good way, but how? Melon seeds are key to the goal. If you want to raise a parrot, there are in fact many restrictions on choosing the right one. How should I put it? Dont miss Cute Pet Guide!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Early morning - and Dr. Matt is on a routine visit to Flamingoland, near Malton, in North Yorkshire. As a specialist in exotic animals, he oversees the care of all the parks unusual inhabitants. Today, Matts in for some donkey work. Hes down on the childrens farm for a spot of dentistry on a young donkey that proves to be a bit of a handful.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In The Wirral, Inspector Anthony Joynes is called out to a shocking case where nine year old German Shepherd Reo has been left with an awful skin condition. Despite scratching so much that her face is covered in open sores she is still able to muster a wag of the tail, but will she have the strength to overcome her painful condition?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The Japanese animated film My Neighbor Totoro, which is popular all over the world is the childhood memory of many. Totoros classic furry body, round eyes and cute expression are very endearing. In South America, there is a kind of chinchilla that looks very similar to Totoro in the film. I heard that Taiwan now allows legal imports of these animals for breeding! Today, lets follow the Totoro zoo owner Molly and fall in love with the soft and cute charm of this animation star!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet to bring you the most hilarious clips of Budgies (and other birds) on the planet, not so much -whos a clever boy- as -whos a funny boy-! Flying fails, performing Parrots and the real life angry birds -V weve assembled the very best the web has to offer, guaranteed to make you laugh out loud.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: A lone cow has gone wild and escaped into a neighbouring field.Dr. Matt has been called in to lend a hand. The heifer went wild two months ago and various tactics are employed to get Matt close enough to get a good shot with his dart gun. But the wary cow wins the first round and escapes. Matt decides to return another day.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Cathy Hyde is on a warrant to access a property in Leigh, suspected of being involved in puppy trafficking. Cathy discovers two Jack Russell types and two Yorkshire Terriers. Tragically, they were too late one for one dog that had passed away and another has badly fractured leg. Will Cathy be able to provide the escape that these dogs desperately need?

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from Madagascar is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie The Secret Life of Pets are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from The Avengers!

The heifer went wild two months ago and various tactics are employed to get Matt close enough to get a good shot with his dart gun. But the wary cow wins the first round and escapes. Matt decides to return another day.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From Christmas as youve never experienced it before, with out-of-tune carol singers, Santa getting stuck, ungrateful children and exploding Christmas puddings - to OAPs, kids and even blundering burglars, six brand spanking new topics are given the trademark LOL treatment, combining user-generated footage with comic narration by comedian Iain Lee. Theres a treat too for animal lovers with a Puppies special featuring some of the cutest, as well as funniest, puppy clips on the web.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Cathy Hyde is on a warrant to access a property in Leigh, suspected of being involved in puppy trafficking. Cathy discovers two Jack Russell types and two Yorkshire Terriers. Tragically, they were too late one for one dog that had passed away and another has badly fractured leg. Will Cathy be able to provide the escape that these dogs desperately need?

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The meerkat king from Madagascar is funny, but meerkats in real life are well-behaved, cuddly and they heal our hearts! Pocket sized pets are currently all the rage, but there are details you need to pay attention to when raising them. For example, hedgehogs are highly defensive, timid sugar gliders will harm themselves without being next to their owners, and cute guinea pigs like Norman from the movie The Secret Life of Pets are easily abandoned due to being easy to obtain and raise, etc. Dont worry, experts will teach you how to raise them! Come to a restaurant in Kaohsiung to get up close with Rocket Raccoon from The Avengers!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: From the funniest feline fails, to the cutest of kittens weve dug out the very best the internet has to offer, and weve the cream of the crop right here.

programme.title: Scruffts
programme.desc: Six dogs, six handlers, all competing in the worlds largest and most famous dog show: Crufts.nnBut they are not the pedigree pooches who compete to be labelled Best in Show. These are the loveable family pets competing to win the Scruffts title.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: The charm of cute rabbits is irresistible! An old man raised hundreds of rabbits?! Playful little rabbits are spoiled yet timid! What should beginners pay attention to when raising rabbits?! Shocking! Rabbits can be poisoned by eating carrots?! Rabbits have a very bad temper?! They kick people they dont like?! Crazy about rabbits! Caregivers takes care of the little rabbits wholeheartedly?!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt pays his weekly visit to Flamingoland, near Malton in North Yorkshire, and is called to inspect a new arrival, a male Asian Sarus Crane brought in as company to a resident female. They are an endangered species but the cranes havent yet warmed to each other and Matt offers advice.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Inspector Herchy Boal teams up with the police to attend a property near Birmingham suspected of puppy farming. Tragically, for one puppy it was already too late, but she manages to rescue another 37 including 8 expectant mothers. Herchy discovers a range of breeds including Shih-Tzus, West Highland Terriers and Cavashons, but with many pups still yet to be born, how will they all get on?

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Sulcata tortoises are the third largest land tortoise in the world, native to the Sahel Corridor in Africa. They do not come from the desert!!! They need to take baths and drink water too!!!nThey are 5 to 7 centimeters tall at birth, with bright black eyes that are super attractive. They grow really fast when healthy, adults can reach 0.9 meters in size and live over 100 years. But they will easily catch a cold and get sick if you are not careful. How to keep your turtles healthy? Lets hear what the experts say!

programme.title: Thanksgiving Special
programme.desc: Noah walks us through making his Smoked Turkey Gravy recipe. Get a jump start on Thanksgiving and make your stock in advance! Saving yourself the headache the day of.

programme.title: Meat Lovers!
programme.desc: On this episode, we serve up our favorite meat-themed recipes! From chicken, to pork and steak, meat lovers everywhere are in for a treat!

programme.title: All About the Bread!
programme.desc: On this episode, we explore some of our favorite bread-themed recipes and learn some fun facts about each dish along the way! From breakfast, to lunch and dinner, your next dish to try at home is just around the corner!

programme.title: Dinner Party!
programme.desc: On this episode, were throwing a Tastemade dinner party, and everyones invited! From appetizers to desserts, we share some of our favorite dinner party recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: Winter Wonderland
programme.desc: When the cold and snowy season descends upon us, its only fitting youll want some delicious, home-cooked food to warm you up. Good thing were taking a trip through our Winter Wonderland today! So toss aside those mittens... its time to cook!

programme.title: Dishes of the World!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip around the world and spotlight some of our favorite recipes from Europe, Asia and Africa. Grab your passport and get ready for a tasty trip!

programme.title: Latin Lovers... Of Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip down to South America as we feature some of our favorite Latin-inspired recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: European Adventure
programme.desc: Today, we embark on a European Adventure! Well be visiting the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Greece to check out their culinary wonders. So what are we waiting for? Lets get to it!

programme.title: Healthy Meals!
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you why eating healthy can still be delicious and enjoyable! Join us for a Tastemade Recipe Rundown of some of our favorite healthy meals!

programme.title: Sweet and Savory!
programme.desc: On this episode, were serving up something for sweet and savory lovers alike. Opposites will attract and stomachs will grumble in this sweet and savory Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Cheat Day!
programme.desc: On this episode, we help you splurge with some of our favorite breakfast, lunch and dinner cheat day recipes! No calorie counting allowed!

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.desc: Its 4th of July and Chef Dale is ready to celebrate by grilling up his takes on summer bbq classics, like his galbi smash double cheeseburger with kimchi special sauce, honey butter steak fries, and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.title: Its Taco Time
programme.desc: Tacos are the way to Chef Dales heart, and to prove it, hes grilling up a sweet and smoky lemongrass and guajillo pork with pineapple, served with coconut and cotija cheese corn and an avocado jicama salad.

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.desc: Grilling isnt only about fast and casual dinners. Chef Dale grills to impress with this elegant, restaurant quality meal of whole roasted fish, coconut milk grits, and snow pea, watermelon and tamarind salad.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: Brunch On The Grill
programme.desc: Wake up, its time to grill! Chef Dale greets the day with a showstopping dutch baby pancake and tangerine syrup, crispy hash browns topped with creme fraiche and roe, and a ham steak smothered in sweet cherry mostarda and red eye gravy.

programme.title: Vegetables, But Delicious
programme.desc: Grilling is the perfect way to imbue your veggies with deliciousness. Chef Dale crafts a family style platter of trumpet mushrooms, eggplant marinated in spicy ssam jang, and charred yellow squash served with a green goddess dressing.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: End of Summer Seafood Feast
programme.desc: The end of summer is near, and Chef Dale goes out in style with a giant seafood feast! Lobster, crab, clams, shrimp, and scallops, all served directly on the table with plenty of buttery garlic bread. Thanks for watching, and until we grill again!

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and dont forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: Sausage Egg And Cheese All Day Long
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings out the best of brunch with sweet and savory hits such as Bacon Wrapped Dates Stuffed with Chorizo, Maple Sausage, Egg, And Cheese Fried Rice, and the tastiest BBQ Duck, Egg, And Corn Scallion Pancake Sandwiches youve ever eaten.

programme.title: Summer Surf n Turf
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks lobster And steak to the curb as he puts a Spanish-style spin on your typical surf n turf by creating Pork And Clams, Lobster and Mushroom Fideos, and Tomato And Tuna Bread then washing it all down with a tasty Michelada.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, And grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks The Porterhouse.

programme.title: Kabobs and Skewers
programme.desc: Kabobs and skewers are a family tradition for Chef Dale. This Mediterranean-inspired meal features beef and shrimp kabobs with grilled tomatoes, potatoes, and eggplant, all served on warm pita with a tangy white sauce.

programme.title: Dishes of the World!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip around the world and spotlight some of our favorite recipes from Europe, Asia and Africa. Grab your passport and get ready for a tasty trip!

programme.title: Latin Lovers... Of Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip down to South America as we feature some of our favorite Latin-inspired recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: European Adventure
programme.desc: Today, we embark on a European Adventure! Well be visiting the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Greece to check out their culinary wonders. So what are we waiting for? Lets get to it!

programme.title: Healthy Meals!
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you why eating healthy can still be delicious and enjoyable! Join us for a Tastemade Recipe Rundown of some of our favorite healthy meals!

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.desc: Its 4th of July and Chef Dale is ready to celebrate by grilling up his takes on summer bbq classics, like his galbi smash double cheeseburger with kimchi special sauce, honey butter steak fries, and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.title: Its Taco Time
programme.desc: Tacos are the way to Chef Dales heart, and to prove it, hes grilling up a sweet and smoky lemongrass and guajillo pork with pineapple, served with coconut and cotija cheese corn and an avocado jicama salad.

programme.title: Restaurant-Style Whole Roast Fish
programme.desc: Grilling isnt only about fast and casual dinners. Chef Dale grills to impress with this elegant, restaurant quality meal of whole roasted fish, coconut milk grits, and snow pea, watermelon and tamarind salad.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.desc: If youre going to grill chicken, youll want to make it good. Chef Dale likes to kick up the heat with his angry chicken, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken, and his kung pao chicken wings.

programme.title: How have you bean?
programme.desc: Beans are one of the best foods in the world. They are sustainable to grow, great for your nutrition, affordable and delicious. So in this episode, were taking a deep dive into beans!

programme.title: The Sandwich Episode
programme.desc: This is.... THE SANDWICH EPISODE, featuring The Bear culinary producer Courtney Storer. Courtney and Noah recreate the iconic steak sandwich from the beloved tv series.

programme.title: The Soup Episode
programme.desc: Its time to get warm and fire up some soup. Pantry Minestrone makes a veggie-loaded comfort soup using almost entirely canned or frozen pantry ingredients. Were also going to show you how to make a beautiful homemade chicken stock.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Special
programme.desc: Noah walks us through making his Smoked Turkey Gravy recipe. Get a jump start on Thanksgiving and make your stock in advance! Saving yourself the headache the day of.

programme.title: Meat Lovers!
programme.desc: On this episode, we serve up our favorite meat-themed recipes! From chicken, to pork and steak, meat lovers everywhere are in for a treat!

programme.title: All About the Bread!
programme.desc: On this episode, we explore some of our favorite bread-themed recipes and learn some fun facts about each dish along the way! From breakfast, to lunch and dinner, your next dish to try at home is just around the corner!

programme.title: Dinner Party!
programme.desc: On this episode, were throwing a Tastemade dinner party, and everyones invited! From appetizers to desserts, we share some of our favorite dinner party recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: Winter Wonderland
programme.desc: When the cold and snowy season descends upon us, its only fitting youll want some delicious, home-cooked food to warm you up. Good thing were taking a trip through our Winter Wonderland today! So toss aside those mittens... its time to cook!

programme.title: Dishes of the World!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip around the world and spotlight some of our favorite recipes from Europe, Asia and Africa. Grab your passport and get ready for a tasty trip!

programme.title: Latin Lovers... Of Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, we take a trip down to South America as we feature some of our favorite Latin-inspired recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: European Adventure
programme.desc: Today, we embark on a European Adventure! Well be visiting the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Greece to check out their culinary wonders. So what are we waiting for? Lets get to it!

programme.title: Healthy Meals!
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you why eating healthy can still be delicious and enjoyable! Join us for a Tastemade Recipe Rundown of some of our favorite healthy meals!

programme.title: Sweet and Savory!
programme.desc: On this episode, were serving up something for sweet and savory lovers alike. Opposites will attract and stomachs will grumble in this sweet and savory Recipe Rundown!

programme.title: Cheat Day!
programme.desc: On this episode, we help you splurge with some of our favorite breakfast, lunch and dinner cheat day recipes! No calorie counting allowed!

programme.title: Summer BBQ
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but theres still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics thatll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: Bring Your Own Lunch
programme.desc: Frankie is all about BYOL - bring your own lunch. Its not only good for your wallet, its good for your health. Skip the vending machine and the cafeteria in favor of creative, cost effective and easy-to-transport midday meals.

programme.title: Salad Salad Salad
programme.desc: Amp up your salad game with a little mixing and matching, from light and leafy greens to crisp and hearty toppings, and dressings for all occasions. Frankie shows us how versatile and fulfilling a homemade salad can truly be.

programme.title: How Do You Like Them Apples
programme.desc: Apples arent just good for keeping the doctor away. Frankie demonstrates how to make the most of this beloved, everyday fruit, from sweet treats to savory meals. Theres a whole world of apples to dive into, especially while theyre in season.

programme.title: Super Squash
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of squash: theyre affordable, abundant and they come in all shapes, sizes, colors, and textures. Frankie spotlights squash from summer through winter highlighting their amazing superhero traits.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Lets Play Ball
programme.desc: Batter up! Fall ball is heating up, and Frankies offering us his favorite stadium snacks, without those major league prices. No matter who youre rooting for, these ballpark classics will be a hit with friends and family for seasons to come.

programme.title: The Future is Flavor
programme.desc: Frankie harnesses the power of time to transform simple ingredients into flavorful goods thatll stick around for a long time. Learn the basics of preserving, pickling And curing to make dinner anything but a struggle. It just takes a little patience.

programme.title: Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Join Frankie as he shares his budget friendly takes on Oktoberfest-inspired dishes, perfect for celebrating the fall season with friends. These festive and hearty meals will keep you cozy and full, and best of all, pair nicely with a beer.

programme.title: We Knead Pizza
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, its time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, youre bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Grubby Good Food
programme.desc: Send your taste buds on a first class food tour without even leaving the Struggle kitchen! Frankie whips up his favorite regional specialties from five destinations, making them as authentic as possible while sticking to his budget.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: Meals Under $7
programme.desc: At a loss when your pantry is empty? With these recipes, you can walk into any grocery store with only $7 and walk out with everything you need for an entire meal. Because yes, you can whip up a nutritious meal at an affordable price!

programme.title: Christmas In July
programme.desc: Its July on the calendar but Christmas in our hearts. Frankie whips up three summertime twists on Christmas themed dishes and serves up tips and tricks for celebrating the most wonderful time of year in July.

programme.title: Bakes Around The World
programme.desc: Join Mia on a trip around the world without leaving the kitchen! From the Japanese Christmas Cake to Jewish Rugelach to German Pfeffernusse to Mexican Bunuelos. Your taste buds will get a tour with these holiday bakes from around the world.

programme.title: Fantastic Pastry Presents
programme.desc: Tis the season for gift giving! Mia walks us through her favorite pastry presents to give to loved ones. From classic cookie gift tins to no bake cheesecakes to savory bakes of cheese and crackers. There is something here for everyone on your list.

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Pantry Pasta
programme.desc: Keep your pantry stocked with a few basic staples, and youll always have ingredients on hand for dinner, especially for pasta night. In this episode, Frankie creates delicious pasta dishes with the kitchens best-kept secret weapon the pantry.

programme.title: Potato Variety Show
programme.desc: Today, Frankies slicing, mashing and smashing his way through the spud species, an essential staple for any Struggle kitchen. Theyve got so many talents and textures that whichever way you dig em, potatoes will never let you down.

programme.title: Citrus Sunshine
programme.desc: Winter citrus is here to brighten up your day. Frankie is fixing up some light, zesty, and affordable recipes to add a little seasonal sunshine to your plate.

programme.title: Over the Top Holiday Cakes
programme.desc: Mia Starr gives a crash course in her all-time favorite, most used decorating techniques. From piping styles to watercolor frosting to maximalist designs, she teaches the basics of holiday cake decorating, in her own signature style.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara dan meneroka sendiri budaya dan tempat-tempat menarik.

programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Polices Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: Dont Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their fathers 2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was 2B...

programme.title: New Trial
programme.desc: A lawyer in debt finds new meaning to his job when hes enlisted by a young man to clear his name after spending 10 years in prison for a crime he did not commit.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Roundup: Punishment
programme.desc: Ma Seok-Do investigates a drug-trafficking app, uncovers a link to an illegal organization. As Baek Chang-Gi terrorizes the gambling market, an alliance is formed to stop the threat.

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Harbin
programme.desc: In 1908, Ahn Jung-geun and Korean independence fighters win against Japanese army. A year later, they head to Harbin as the Japanese statesman Uto Hirobumi is going for negotiation...

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy theyll never forget.

programme.title: I Am the King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: The Noisy Mansion
programme.desc: Geo-ul moves into the mysterious apartment plagued by unexplained floor noise. Determined to solve the mystery, she faces unexpected challenges while uncovering the apartments secrets.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juris grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: Real estate agent Jung-Tae has a penchant for spying. He discovers the death of the social media star So-Ra. He is falsely accused of murder and is determined to find the real culprit.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimers after a car accident.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Sleep
programme.desc: A man turns into a different person in sleep every night ever since he murmurs something strange, bringing fear and danger to his wife and their soon-to-be-born child...

programme.title: Tazza: the Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-nis nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now hes planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.desc: Ma Seok-Do investigates a drug-trafficking app, uncovers a link to an illegal organization. As Baek Chang-Gi terrorizes the gambling market, an alliance is formed to stop the threat.

programme.title: Countdown (2023)
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: Hidden Face
programme.desc: While Sung-jin is searching for his fiancee Su-yeon, he meets her friend Mi-ju. A breathtaking thriller unfolds in which Su-yeon, who is trapped in a secret room, witnesses a naked truth.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E124
programme.desc: Dispuesto a esclarecer el misterio sobre la muerte de Genara, Federico le ofrece ayuda a Sergio para castigar al verdadero culpable del asesinato as este sea su propia madre (Fernanda). Cada la noche, Florencia semidesnuda- se acuesta al lado de un embriagado Nicols para hacerle creer que han dormido juntos, pues la joven Zapata solo necesita un hijo para recuperar el amor de Nicols. Al siguiente da, Nicols lamenta haber usado a Florencia; el hombre no puede ofrecerle amor, por lo que sera un error concebir otro hijo; a pesar de que el dolor de perder a su primer hijo los une, Nicols decide separarse de ella. A solas, Florencia se comunica con Hilario para citarlo en las tierras de Cantarrana; Florencia tiene la intencion de embarazarse para as retener a su esposo a su lado.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E13
programme.desc: Camila insiste en que la mujer presa es su mam y la Madre Isabel le dice que Rosa Blanco, presa por asesinar a un hombre, no es su madre. El destino entrelaza a las familias en guerra. Buscan identidad de El Doliente

programme.desc: Ral le asegura a Clara Ines que cuenta con todo el tiempo del mundo, para ella para perdonarlo y el para amarla; la pareja se besa enamorada.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E32
programme.desc: Isabel and Malena seal their pact of unconditional friendship. Alberto obtains a copy of the file of the drug trafficker accused of Marco Aurelios death. Magda tells Lorena what happened and suggests opening an e-mail account, where the video with her confession will be kept. Alberto raises the possibility that his uncle Claudio is involved in his fathers death.

programme.desc: Adriana le pregunta a su madre que fue lo que paso con Patricia y justo en el momento que le dice que Patricia es una prostituta, llega Emiliano.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E31
programme.desc: Ninoska contina tratando de hablar mal de los Palacios,diciendo que una de las Palacios es la oveja negra de la familia. Carlos Ral estalla ante este comentario.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E125 - Episodio 125
programme.desc: Tras descubrir a Florencia en compaa de Hilario, Nicols acusa a Guanipa de estar manipulando a la mujer para que esta le de informacion sobre la investigacion que realiza Nicols sobre la muerte de su padre. Mientras Hilario admite ante su hija Victoria ser el culpable del incendio que azota las tierras de Cantarrana por su afn de vengarse de Nicols; un peon le notifica a Nicols que un feroz incendio arrasa con los maizales de Los Samanes. Sergio acepta la propuesta de matrimonio de Victoria y espera que algn da lo ame tanto como el.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E33
programme.desc: Malena knows she must return home to avoid losing her son. Pedro instructs Cheo to liquidate Lorena; without hurting Alberto. Ricardo is still not sure which of the Marias is the swindler. Lorena kisses Alberto goodbye and Cheo is close by, waiting for the right moment to dissipate.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E34
programme.desc: Guillermo catches up with Cheo and kills him; he is now pointing at Alberto and Lorena Gunshots are heard in the house. programme.desc: Ninoska contina tratando de hablar mal de los Palacios,diciendo que una de las Palacios es la oveja negra de la familia. Carlos Ral estalla ante este comentario.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E124
programme.desc: Dispuesto a esclarecer el misterio sobre la muerte de Genara, Federico le ofrece ayuda a Sergio para castigar al verdadero culpable del asesinato as este sea su propia madre (Fernanda). Cada la noche, Florencia semidesnuda- se acuesta al lado de un embriagado Nicols para hacerle creer que han dormido juntos, pues la joven Zapata solo necesita un hijo para recuperar el amor de Nicols. Al siguiente da, Nicols lamenta haber usado a Florencia; el hombre no puede ofrecerle amor, por lo que sera un error concebir otro hijo; a pesar de que el dolor de perder a su primer hijo los une, Nicols decide separarse de ella. A solas, Florencia se comunica con Hilario para citarlo en las tierras de Cantarrana; Florencia tiene la intencion de embarazarse para as retener a su esposo a su lado.

programme.desc: Tras descubrir a Florencia en compaa de Hilario, Nicols acusa a Guanipa de estar manipulando a la mujer para que esta le de informacion sobre la investigacion que realiza Nicols sobre la muerte de su padre. programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E32
programme.desc: Carlos Ral y Cesar han llegado a casa de los Palacios. A punto de llorar, el gordo toma a la pequea entre sus brazos.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E125 - Episodio 125
programme.desc: Tras descubrir a Florencia en compaa de Hilario, Nicols acusa a Guanipa de estar manipulando a la mujer para que esta le de informacion sobre la investigacion que realiza Nicols sobre la muerte de su padre. Sergio acepta la propuesta de matrimonio de Victoria y espera que algn da lo ame tanto como el.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E126
programme.desc: Por ms que Hilario insiste en rehacer su vida junto a Florencia, esta cree que an existen cosas por perder antes de ser feliz al lado de Hilario Guanipa Ante Federico, Fernanda debe admitir que asesino a Genara; a solas, Federico guarda la confesion de su madre que ha grabado en una cmara de video. Despues de una semana, Victoria insiste en casarse con Sergio a pesar de que Adelaida y Clementina se niegan; si bien Victoria no ama a Sergio, necesita el apoyo de su madre para ser feliz; Adelaida no quiere que su hija cometa un error. Una vez en la jefatura civil, Carmencita trata de convencer a Victoria de cancelar su matrimonio, mientras que Hilario cree que Sergio obliga a Victoria a casarse; en ese momento, Nicols se presenta en el lugar para manifestarle a Victoria que Sergio tiene negocios sordidos con Fernanda, pero Victoria no le cree a Del Casal.Ante Fernanda, Sergio afirma tener su confesion sobre la muerte de Genara, por lo que Fernanda apunta al hombre con su arma; la pareja discute el arma se dispara; Florencia observa como Sergio herido a muerte- sale del despacho.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E15
programme.desc: Camila est feliz pues su madre, al fin, est libre, pero Max sigue dudando. Reunidas, quiere saber porque la abandono la mujer finge no recordar esos momentos dolorosos. La abandona por segunda vez. Es un golpe muy fuerte.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E16
programme.desc: Max est decepcionado por la reunion entre Ezequiel y Camila. En este momento de depresion Astrid trata de hacerse su buena amiga, pero el la rechaza. Camila busca a Max, est triste y le d la razon: esa mujer no es su madre.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E35
programme.desc: Pedro warns Guillermo that the police know it was him who killed Cheo. Lorena, is on the defensive with Omar for trying to romance her to get a confession. Carmen makes Virginia see that what the couple proposed to her is child trafficking. Lorena is surprised by Guillermo, gun in hand, he tells her that he came for her and her son.
